snippet: The Formula One team Caterham was sold to a group of Swiss and Middle Eastern investors, led by the former HRT team boss Colin Kolles.
lead_paragraph: The Formula One team Caterham was sold to a group of Swiss and Middle Eastern investors, led by the former HRT team boss Colin Kolles.

headline.main: Formula One’s Caterham Under New Ownership
headline.print_headline: Formula One’s Caterham Under New Ownership
